short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View XMLTV files directly in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to view any XMLTV file directly in your browser via a simple and easy-to-use interface.

Features:
- built-in channel search
- support for different time zones

How to enable local file support:
1. Select "More" (3 dots) in the right corner > Extensions > Manage Extensions.
2. Find "EPG Viewer" in the list.
3. Select "Details".
4. Enable "Allow access to file URLs".
